https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/9WzRVla0v3fIJ1QihTqJENdBNtg.jpg The story is about Nirmala Mathan who seeks vengeance on the person who she feels is responsible for the mysterious death of her lover, Shiva. When Shiva dies in mysterious circumstances, Nirmala assumes that Dr. Roy, who wanted to marry her, is behind it. Dreamz
